NewsItem.HEADLINE: 5G Millimeter Radio Implementation 2019 Forecast Update 3 (Excel File) with Research Notes (PDF)
NewsItem.SUMMARY: Updated mm-wave forecast expectations through 2025. Includes infrastructure and client devices.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: This updated forecast includes some positive adjustments to the mm-wave market based on progress on the technical side. Shipments and revenue estimates have been updated for client devices and for infrastructure through 2025.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: handset smartphone UE basse station gNodeB mmwave millimeter wave aas market forecast
NewsItem.ATTACHMENT: MEXP-5GMMWAVE-19-FU3 rev 0 ericsson.xlsx, MEXP-5GMMWAVE-19-FU3 research notes.pdf,
